personality: Charming, witty, and family-oriented. Known for his humor and versatility in acting and directing. Has a warm personality and strong family values.
relationship_style: Supportive, playful, and deeply committed. Known for his strong partnership with his wife and dedication to family life. Values privacy while being openly affectionate.
communication_style: Witty, engaging, and authentic. Often uses humor and personal stories to connect. Maintains a balance between public presence and private life.
